sub_title: Manager DevOps & ICT @ Yoast SEO | Project Manager, Agile Expert/Coach, Product Owner and Scrum Master
summary:
As a pragmatic technology leader, I excel in complex environments and advocate for simple, long-term, stable, and maintainable solution strategies. With a growth mindset and a focus on a people-first culture, I employ a bottom-up approach to managing teams. I value the input of my team members and always make time for their professional criticism and insights.

I possess a keen ability to identify the core of an issue and distinguish main concerns from peripheral ones. Proactive and driven by challenges, I take the initiative to ask questions and gather the right information. My choices and decisions are based on logical reasoning and are informed and thoughtful. I strive to create a support base by explaining the rationale behind my decisions.

In addition to these skills, I have a talent for seeing, creating, and seizing opportunities. I am an excellent leader who inspires others to achieve their full potential.

profile_positions.description:
As Manager DevOps & ICT, I am responsible for leading and managing the DevOps, Field Services, and Functional Applications Manager teams. My role involves ensuring that these teams work effectively and efficiently to achieve the company’s goals. I am responsible for planning, organizing, and executing projects and initiatives to improve the company’s ICT infrastructure and systems.

Key responsibilities:
- Leading the DevOps, Field Services, and Functional Applications Manager teams
- Ensuring the effective and efficient operation of these teams to achieve the company’s goals
- Planning, organizing, and executing projects and initiatives to improve the company’s ICT infrastructure and systems
- Collaborating with other departments and stakeholders to achieve the company’s goals
- Ensuring continuous improvement of processes and systems within these teams
- Managing the budget for these teams and ensuring cost-effective operation
- Ensuring good communication within these teams and with other departments
- Coaching and guiding these teams
- Implementing the Agile framework and methodology with these teams, specifically Kanban with elements borrowed from Scrum
- Ensuring that all development environments, automations, pipelines, business and collaboration software (Microsoft365 and Google Workspace, Zoom etc.) work so that everyone can work as efficiently as possible
- Engaging in service capacity planning and demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning
- Supervising the design and implementation of innovations that improve software velocity, infrastructure resiliency, security, and data availability
- Progressing adoption and maximizing efficiency of DevOps tooling
- Managing information technology and computer systems
- Recruiting, training, and coaching IT staff
profile_positions.title: Manager DevOps & ICT

profile_positions.description:
As a Global Technical Project Manager, I have successfully led the rollout of SAP Cloud for Customer Service Cloud and SAP Field Service Management for Equipment Services in 26 countries.

Key responsibilities:
- Developing and managing project budgets and timelines.
- Communicating project progress and status to stakeholders.
- Working with multilingual teams across the globe to establish and implement training processes and strategies.
- Analyzing, planning, and developing requirements and standards for scheduled projects.
- Assigning and overseeing project team tasks while ensuring progress towards established milestones.
- Holding regular team meetings to determine progress and address any questions or challenges.
- Identifying and mitigating project risks.
- Coordinating with other departments and teams to ensure project success.
- Ensuring that project deliverables met quality standards.
- Determining and defining clear deliverables, roles, and responsibilities for team members.
- Researching and evaluating hardware and software technology options, weighing cost/benefit analysis when making large purchases on behalf of the company.
- Managing vendor relationships and contracts.
Training exceptional employees to fulfill posted positions within the technical department.
- Updating and maintaining technologies to ensure proper maintenance and installation.

I have demonstrated competencies in the following areas:
- Project Management
- Communication
- Multilingual
- Training and Development
- Requirements Analysis
- Task Delegation and Oversight
- Team Management
- Risk Management
- Coordination and Collaboration
- Quality Assurance
- Deliverable Definition
- Research and Evaluation
- Vendor Management
- Contract Negotiation
- Employee Training and Development
- Technology Maintenance and Installation

I have also demonstrated strong leadership abilities, including problem-solving, decision-making, adaptability, and the ability to work well under pressure.
profile_positions.title: Global Technical Project Manager – Digital Solutions

profile_positions.description:
As a Technical Project Manager, I have managed projects and provided support to organizations under the Dutch RvA K109 accreditation (BE/D/DK/NL/NO).

Key responsibilities have included:
- Developing and managing project budgets and timelines.
- Communicating project progress and status to stakeholders.
- Assessing and resolving complex business process issues.
- Collaborating with suppliers, departments within the global Avantor organization, and other stakeholders to ensure project success.
- Implementing new methodologies and spearheading improvements to enhance efficiency and productivity.
- Participating in project management as a key contributor.
- Identifying and mitigating project risks.
- Coordinating with other departments and teams to ensure project success.
- Ensuring that project deliverables met quality standards.
- Serving as a superuser for SAP/Hermes/Unilab Pro (calibration app), providing expert support to all organizations under the Dutch RvA K109 accreditation.
- Supporting the quality system and actively participating in quality meetings.
- Translating the business’ wishes into practical and effective technical solutions.
- Performing internal audits to ensure compliance with industry standards.
- Managing vendor relationships and contracts.
- Serving as a valued member of the Dutch Avantor Services Management Team, contributing to the strategic direction of the company.

I have demonstrated competencies in the following areas:
- Project Management
- Communication
- Business Process Analysis
- Collaboration
- Methodology Implementation
- Efficiency Improvement
- Risk Management
- Coordination and Collaboration
- Quality Assurance
- Technical Support
- Quality System Support
- Technical Solution Development
- Internal Auditing
- Vendor Management
- Contract Negotiation
- Strategic Planning

I have also demonstrated strong leadership abilities, including problem-solving, decision-making, adaptability, and the ability to work well under pressure.
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
In my role as a Sales Engineer, I have successfully managed multiple projects to ensure timely delivery and customer satisfaction.

My key responsibilities have included:
- Implementing high availability solutions through clustering to ensure minimal downtime for our clients.
- Working with both on-premise and cloud-based infrastructures, including IaaS and PaaS.
- Deploying and managing virtual servers and providing cloud services to meet the needs of our clients.
- Implementing anti-DDoS, anti-spam, intrusion detection and prevention measures to ensure the security of our clients’ systems.
- Presenting products or services that would be beneficial to clients through detailed presentations that show product info, pricing, and benefits.
- Developing and successfully selling product or program suggestions for clients.
Managing billing and delivery of solid products.
- Providing customer support and aftersales service to ensure customer satisfaction.

In addition to these responsibilities, I have also demonstrated competencies in the following areas:
- Project Management
- High Availability Solutions
- Infrastructure Management
- Virtual Server Deployment
- Cloud Services Provision
- Security Measures Implementation
- Product Presentation
- Sales
- Billing and Delivery Management
- Customer Support
- Aftersales Service

I have also demonstrated strong competencies in the following areas:
- Creativity in approaching sales and building customer relationships.
- Excellent written and oral communication skills.
Business-to-business (B2B) sales experience.
- Solid industry experience.
- Excellent organizational skills with a keen eye for detail.
- Computer proficiency and ability to accurately enter data and generate reports.
- Negotiation and social problem-solving skills.
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
In my role as IT Consultant at this Joint Venture that created tailored software, I have successfully provided consulting services to clients. One of my most notable achievements was managing the development and implementation of an Emergency Response Officer (BHV in Dutch) system for NXP Nijmegen and Eindhoven. This involved overseeing the creation of a planning module for courses for Emergency Response Officers, managers and teachers, as well as the development of a statistics module of the occupation degree, triggers and alarms for management and the ERT (Emergency Response Team).

My key responsibilities have included:
- Managing the development and implementation of software solutions for clients.
- Working closely with developers to translate business needs into technical requirements.
- Overseeing the creation of software modules and features to meet client needs.
- Providing technical support and guidance to clients.

In addition to these responsibilities, I have also demonstrated competencies in the following areas:
- Project management
- Team management
- Business analysis
- Client consulting

I have also demonstrated strong competencies in the following areas:
- Excellent written and oral communication skills
- Solid industry experience
- Excellent organizational skills with a keen eye for detail
- Computer proficiency and ability to accurately enter data and generate reports
- Problem-solving skills
profile_positions.title: Co-Owner and Director

profile_positions.description:
In my role as Marketing & Product Development Coordinator at a company that sold high quality aftermarket parts for the recycling and reuse of toner and inkjet cartridges, I have successfully coordinated marketing and product development efforts for the European market, including Russia, Ukraine, former Yugoslavia etc.
My key responsibilities have included:
- Determining short and long term marketing objectives and strategy in collaboration with US colleagues.
- Generating contacts for more and new business.
- Collaborating with US colleagues on product development.
- Initiating and implementing new products, innovations, promotions and projects to achieve the objectives.
- Prospecting; developing potential markets and new customer relationships.
- Writing newsletters and press releases.
- Creating promotional material.
- Setting up and executing direct mail campaigns.
- Collecting market and competition information.
- Organizing workshops, seminars and fairs.

In addition to these responsibilities, I have also demonstrated competencies in the following areas:
- Marketing strategy development
- Product development
- Business development
- Market research
- Promotion creation
- Event planning

I have also demonstrated strong competencies in the following areas:

- Solid industry experience

- Computer proficiency and ability to accurately enter data and generate reports
- Problem-solving skills
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Product Development Coordinator

In my role as Quality Control & Technical Support Representative at a company that sold high quality aftermarket parts for the recycling and reuse of toner and inkjet cartridges, I have successfully provided quality control and technical support for the European market, including Russia, Ukraine, former Yugoslavia etc.

My key responsibilities have included:
- Conducting quality control for incoming products (Parts for recycling toner cartridges) in collaboration with global suppliers and US colleagues.
- Handling and inspecting RMA in collaboration with global suppliers and US colleagues.
